attributes.action: You claim to know about radicalised individuals, prosecute them or get them out.
attributes.additional_details: This has gone on for to long. If our government does not implement a proper and effective method of removing a terror threat then we are not safe. You know about the indivduals so do something about it before another life has been lost. Stop being cowards and fight the problem. Isis are walking among us in there thousands because you the government have let them in through the refugee program. You give them the funding they need to attack and that needs to stop.
attributes.background: For the safety of our country and our own people. The government claim to know about thousands of radicalised individuals. Get them out of our country or prosecute them to stop another attack happening on our very own soil. Wether it be any faith the follow. If they are a risk remove them.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament don't decide whether an individual should be prosecuted. That's the responsibility of the police and the Crown Prosecution Service.
